ComicInfo.Summary:
Time Is the Killer: After a deadly incident in a clock shop, bodies are stored away in grandfather clocks. Restless as they are, the dead come to take revenge upon their murderer, bringing those clocks along with them.
Vampires: How to deal with vampires.
The Smiling Man: The killer Otto Grotz is followed by a smiling man. He surrenders to the police, only to find out that the smiling man was another gangster - and not a detective stalking him.
Moon Madness: Hobo Emil is bitten by a rabid dog and turns into a werewolf. The townsfolk hunt him down.
The Ghosts in Blue: A country lady encounters ghosts of Civil War soldiers.
The Betraying Hands: An artist commits murder, and his "guilty" hands start working on their own, depicting scenes of the crime. To stop this treachery, the painter has his hands amputated, but they come back to strangle him.
ComicInfo.Title: Time Is the Killer; Vampires; The Smiling Man; Moon Madness; The Ghosts in Blue; The Betraying Hands
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ross Andru,Jack Katz,Art Saaf,Mike Sekowsky,Ross Andru,Jack Katz,Art Saaf,Mike Sekowsky
ComicInfo.Inker: Mike Esposito,Ralph Mayo,Jack Katz,Art Saaf,Mike Peppe,Mike Esposito,Ralph Mayo,Jack Katz,Art Saaf,Mike Peppe
